page.title: 12FOOD EATEN BY THE NIXONS'
page.content: This is a record of the food prepared and eaten by the Nixon family on July 9th.& 10th.1985. Grandma & grandad had for tea on the 9th.,meat,potatoes,cabbage,carrots & gravy.Sweet was strawberries,tea & biscuits.Grandma cooked all of this by herself using an electric cooker & cleared away without any help.For breakfast on the 10th they ate cereal with milk,brownbread spread with lemon curd,fuit & they drank tea. My family had cereal,toast,fruit, & fruitjuice for breakfast.My father, brother & I had school lunch. Mum had granary bread,pate'&fruit.For tea we had bacon ,salad,mousse.It was cooked & prepared by mum we all helped with the clearing up.
